attributes.action: Ban  face coverings from public spaces which renders the person unidentifiable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This appears to be about  racial or religious issues it isnt.Its about security .We live in a facial recognition society try going into a bank dressed like the stig and see what happens! We have a right to know who you are ,you shouldnt be able to hide behind cloth for any reason, cultural or otherwise in public. (at home is your own matter).You could be an escaped convict or wanted by the police for terrorism or any number of things.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
